name: Aaron Tran
description: Co-founded the contest to inspire the next generation of programmers and increase diversity in STEM fields.
Previously worked as a software engineer at a leading tech company.

name: Selene Pham
description: Former research scientist at MIT, specializing in artificial intelligence.
Co-authored several research papers on machine learning and robotics before co-founding the contest to democratize access to coding education.

name: Justin Young
description: Co-founded the contest to create a platform for students to showcase their coding skills and connect with like-minded individuals globally.
Entrepreneur with successful ventures in the tech industry.
